attributes.action: Make it a Madatory Life Sentence for People Conviceted of Knowingly passing on HIV to others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a person who knows they are HIV and Hepatitis C positive and have unprotected sex with another in the knowledge they can pass on the disease to others then they should be convicted like any other person accused of Murder.

They have in effect premeditated a potential death to that person, albeit a delayed death. They should be, on conviction, be given an authomatic Life sentence. And meant LIFE
